name: Smoked Sausage and Tortellini Skillet
author: Hillshire Farm(R) Brand
summary: Bite for bite this one-pan meal is delicious, cheesy and even better: easy!
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package Hillshire Farm® Smoked Sausage, diagonally cut into 1/4-inch slices
1 (12 ounce) package fresh cheese tortellini, cooked according to package directions
directions: Heat a large 12-inch oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat and add smoked sausage, cook until brown
Add garlic, onion and bell pepper
Lower heat to medium and stir until vegetables are soft, about 5 minutes
Stir in cooked tortellini, oregano, marinara sauce and one cup of cheese
Bake in the oven for about 10 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly
